lead_paragraph: Taylor Phinney, from Boulder, Colo., became a two-time junior world champion, winning the 3,000-meter individual pursuit at Cape Town, South Africa. Phinney may be the United States men’s best hope for a cycling medal at the Beijing Olympics, where he will race the 4,000-meter individual pursuit.
